if (!datasources.EventDefinitions_fetchEventDefinitions.latestData()) return /** @type {GridSourceObj} */ var gridData = { data: datasources.EventDefinitions_fetchEventDefinitions.latestData().results.DATA, count: datasources.EventDefinitions_fetchEventDefinitions.latestData().results.TOTAL, keyColumn: 'item_id', highlightId: datasources.EventDefinitions_current_event_def_id.latestData(), // overrideFieldSettings: {}, columns: [ // whitelists what columns work for sort and filter and create modal { ColumnName: 'name', ColumnType: 'string', custom: true }, { ColumnName: 'item_id', ColumnType: 'uuid', custom: true }, { ColumnName: 'event_type_id', ColumnType: 'uuid', custom: true }, { ColumnName: 'description', ColumnType: 'uuid', custom: true }, { ColumnName: 'entity_id', ColumnType: 'uuid', custom: true }, { ColumnName: 'is_inside', ColumnType: 'boolean', custom: true }, { ColumnName: 'area_id', ColumnType: 'uuid', custom: true }, { ColumnName: 'entity2_id', ColumnType: 'uuid', custom: true }, { ColumnName: 'last_updated', ColumnType: 'timestamp', custom: true }, ], } const eventTypeIcons = datasources.fetchEventDefinitionTypes.latestData() && datasources.fetchEventDefinitionTypes.latestData().results.DATA || [] gridData.data = gridData.data.map(d => ({ ...d, event_type_id: (eventTypeIcons.find(t => t.item_id === d.event_type_id) || {}).icon, name: `
${d.name}
${d.description}
` })) // debugger return gridData
